title: Research Risk-Aware Scheduler
reason: We need this skill because research throughput degrades without reproducibility and prioritization. This specific skill times execution based on risk posture instead of urgency alone.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Research Risk-Aware Scheduler`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to non-reproducible results and wasted cycles.
Design and version the input/output contract for hypotheses, experiments, and replication evidence, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using risk-weighted sequencing, and produce risk-gated schedules with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover non-reproducible results and wasted cycles, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.
